title: Did anyone else not get the blue-side icon for the new Rift?
body:
Myself and a couple of friends I play with didn't get the icon after completing a victorious match from blue side. The red one, no problem, and the icon was up fast, but it's been ages since the event ended, and though I've been hesitant to bring it up, I'd really like it at least for completionist's sake. Is anyone else having the same issue?

Update: So far, submitting tickets has worked out for us. TY Riot

replies.body:
If there is an icon you think you didn't get you can always write into support and ask: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

It speeds up resolution time if you include the link to the match history for the specific game or games, as we would normally have to look through your game history one by one to find the game where you should have gotten it.
Ah, thank you much. Would I also be able to include the other person in that specific game who hasn't received theirs yet? Or do they have to do it themselves?
I'd say have them write in their own ticket, just in case there is something we need to clarify.
